Beverly Buchanan (Ọktoba 8, 1940 na Julaị 4, 2015) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya gụnyere eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, vidiyo, na nka ala. A maara Buchanan màkà nchọpụta ya banyéré ụlọ ndịda site na nka ya.

A mụrụ Buchanan na Fuquay, North Carolina, ọ bụkwa nwanne nné ya na nwanne nnà ya zụlitere ya na Orangeburg, South Carolina, ébé nna nkuchi ya bụ dean nke School of Agriculture na South Carolina State College bụ naanị ụlọ akwụkwọ steeti màkà ndị Africa America na South Carolina.
Buchanan na nna ya nọrọ ógè dị ukwuu na njem ya ebe ọ ga-eso ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ n'ime ime Obodo rụọ ọrụ, na-adụ ha ọdụ na usoro ọrụ ugbo ha.
N'afọ 1971, Buchanan debara aha ya na klas Norman Lewis kụziiri na Art Students League na New York City
Lewis, tinyere ónyé na-ese ihe Romare Bearden, ghọrọ ndị enyi na ndị nduzi Buchanan. Mmekọrịta a na Bearden mere mgbè ihe mberede mere na kọntaktị ebe Bearden mepụtara ihe ngosi màkà ihe omume ahụ
Buchanan zutere Norman Lewis n'azụ ikpo okwu mgbè ọ na-anwa ịbịanye aka na poster Bearden, Lewis wee were Buchanan n'azụ azụ iji zute Bearden

Buchanan mechara degara Bearden akwụkwọ ozi na-echetara ya ihe omume ahụ na Bearden ghọrọ ónyé nduzi ya ma mee ka ọ gosipụta nka ya na Cinque Gallery. Buchanan kpebiri ịghọ onye na-ese ihe oge niile na 1977 mgbè ọ gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi nka ọhụrụ na Betty Parsons Gallery. N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ kwagara Macon, Georgia.

E gosipụtara ọrụ Buchanan na Independent Art Fair 2017 na ụlọ Andrew Edlin Gallery. Buchanan kwuru, sị, "Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe m nwèrè okwu ahụ n'aha ha n'ihi na echere m na nke ahụ na-agwa gị na ihe a agafeela ọtụtụ ihe ma lanarị echiche ahụ dị n'azụ ihe ndị a tụrụ atụ
ọ dị ka, ebe a ka m nọ; I ka nọ ebe a!'"
Ọrụ Buchanan dị na nchịkọta nke Addison Art Gallery of American Art na Phillips Academy na Andover, Massachusetts, Georgia Museum of Art, Metropolitan Museum of Art.
